definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: Transom mand cockpit components sorted and being moved to the boat.
sentences.chinese: 横梁和驾驶舱部分排序和被转移到小船。

sentences.english: Ball screws for ram adjustment and crossrail adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 滑枕和横梁为滚珠丝杠。

sentences.english: The upper section of a classical building, resting on the columns and constituting the architrave, frieze, and cornice.
sentences.chinese: 柱顶盘，上横梁一座古典的建筑的上部，置于。

sentences.english: But the fish gate did the sons of Hassenaah build, who also laid the beams thereof, and set up the doors thereof, the locks thereof, and the bars thereof.
sentences.chinese: 哈西拿的子孙建立鱼门，架横梁，安门扇，和闩锁。

sentences.english: When leaving the temple, inadvertently looked up and saw a spider on the beam.
sentences.chinese: 离开寺庙的时候，不经意间抬头看见了横梁上的蛛蛛。

sentences.english: The flames licked at the burned and charred support beams of Steve's little home.
sentences.chinese: 火焰将斯蒂夫家小屋子上的横梁烧焦了。

sentences.english: The 29th minute, Cologne middle place Antar meets a corner kick mallet to hit the crossbeam.
sentences.chinese: 第29分钟，科隆中场安塔尔就接角球头槌击中横梁。

sentences.english: The transverse diaphragm is very similar in appearance to the conventional bar joist.
sentences.chinese: 横梁很相似于通常的钢筋搁栅。

sentences.english: A dressed piece of wood, especially a beam in a structure.
sentences.chinese: 一块整齐的木料，尤指房屋结构中的横梁。

sentences.english: Unscrew threaded joint securing transmission cross member to body.
sentences.chinese: 拧下将变速器横梁固定到车身的螺纹接头。

sentences.english: The traverse extended across the room.
sentences.chinese: 横梁从房间一头跨到另一头。

sentences.english: Remove the tow hook from the lower crossmember.
Architecture To be inserted at one end into a wall, as a floor timber or beam .
sentences.chinese: 一端被嵌入墙内，如铺地板的木料或横梁。

sentences.english: Situate the steering knuckle assembly so that it fits on to the cross member knuckle back plate.
sentences.chinese: 位于该转向节大会，以便它适合于板的横梁关节回来。

sentences.english: Transom and cockpit components sorted and being moved to the boat.
sentences.chinese: 横梁和驾驶舱部分排序和被转移到小船。

definition: an overhung door/a door that hinges upwards
to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
